class.name: LineEdit
class.brief_description: Control that provides single line string editing.
class.description: LineEdit provides a single line string editor, used for text fields.

method.name: append_at_cursor
method.description: Adds [code]text[/code] after the cursor. If the resulting value is longer than [member max_length], nothing happens.

method.name: clear
method.description: Erases the [LineEdit] text.

method.name: cursor_get_blink_enabled
method.description: Gets whether the line edit caret is blinking.

method.name: cursor_get_blink_speed
method.description: Gets the line edit caret blink speed.

method.name: cursor_set_blink_enabled
method.description: Set the line edit caret to blink.

method.name: cursor_set_blink_speed
method.description: Set the line edit caret blink speed. Cannot be less then or equal to 0.

method.name: get_align
method.description: Return the align mode of the [code]LineEdit[/code].

method.name: get_cursor_position
method.description: Returns the cursor position inside the [code]LineEdit[/code].

method.name: get_max_length
method.description: Return the maximum amount of characters the [code]LineEdit[/code] can edit. If 0 is returned, no limit exists.

method.name: get_menu
method.description: Returns the [PopupMenu] of this [code]LineEdit[/code]. By default, this menu is displayed when right-clicking on the [LineEdit].

method.name: get_placeholder
method.description: Return the placeholder text.

method.name: get_placeholder_alpha
method.description: Return transparency of the placeholder text.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Return the text in the [code]LineEdit[/code].

method.name: is_editable
method.description: Return the [i]editable[/i] status of the [code]LineEdit[/code] (see [method set_editable]).

method.name: is_secret
method.description: Return the [i]secret[/i] status of the [code]LineEdit[/code] (see [method set_secret]).

method.name: menu_option
method.description: Executes a given action as defined in the MENU_* enum.

method.name: select
method.description: Selects characters inside [LineEdit] between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code]. By default [code]from[/code] is at the beginning and [code]to[/code] at the end. [codeblock] text = "Welcome" select() # Welcome select(4) # ome select(2, 5) # lco [/codeblock]

method.name: select_all
method.description: Selects the whole [String].

method.name: set_align
method.description: Set text alignment of the [code]LineEdit[/code].

method.name: set_cursor_position
method.description: Sets the cursor position inside the [code]LineEdit[/code]. The text may scroll if needed.

method.name: set_editable
method.description: Set the [i]editable[/i] status of the [code]LineEdit[/code]. When disabled, existing text can't be modified and new text can't be added.

method.name: set_max_length
method.description: Set the maximum amount of characters the [code]LineEdit[/code] can edit, and cropping existing text in case it exceeds that limit. Setting 0 removes the limit.

method.name: set_placeholder
method.description: Set the placeholder text.

method.name: set_placeholder_alpha
method.description: Set transparency of the placeholder text.

method.name: set_secret
method.description: Set the [i]secret[/i] status of the [code]LineEdit[/code]. When enabled, every character is displayed as "*".

method.name: set_text
method.description: Set the text in the [code]LineEdit[/code], clearing the existing one and the selection.

members.member: Text alignment as defined in the ALIGN_* enum.
Duration (in seconds) of a caret's blinking cycle.
If [code]false[/code] existing text cannot be modified and new text cannot be added.
If [code]true[/code] the [LineEdit] width will increase to stay longer than the [member text]. It will [b]not[/b] compress if the [member text] is shortened.
Defines how the [LineEdit] can grab focus (Keyboard and mouse, only keyboard, or none). See [code]enum FocusMode[/code] in [Control] for details.
Maximum amount of characters that can be entered inside the [LineEdit]. If [code]0[/code], there is no limit.
Opacity of the [member placeholder_text]. From [code]0[/code] to [code]1[/code].
Text shown when the [LineEdit] is empty. It is [b]not[/b] the [LineEdit]'s default value (see [member text]).
If [code]true[/code] every character is shown as "*".

signal.name: text_entered
signal.description: Emitted when the user presses KEY_ENTER on the [code]LineEdit[/code].

constants.constant: Aligns the text on the left hand side of the [LineEdit].
Centers the text in the middle of the [LineEdit].
Aligns the text on the right hand side of the [LineEdit].
Stretches whitespaces to fit the [LineEdit]'s width.
Cuts (Copies and clears) the selected text.
Pastes the clipboard text over the selected text (or at the cursor's position).
